Class ExecTask

java.lang.Object

public class ExecTask
extends AntTask<org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.ExecTask>

Executes a given command if the os platform is appropriate.

(Doc copied from: org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.ExecTask)

public ExecTask setRuntimeConfigurableWrapper(org.apache.tools.ant.RuntimeConfigurable val)
Sets the wrapper to be used for runtime configuration. This method should be used only by the ProjectHelper and Ant internals. It is public to allow helper plugins to operate on tasks, normal tasks should never use it.
